mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tradelens.product ( user_id, category_id, title, description, price, quantity, condition_level, negotiable, product_status, is_deleted, view_count, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{conditionLevel}, #{negotiable}, 1 , 0 , 1 , NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE tradelens.product SET product_status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND product_status IN (2, 3) AND is_deleted = 0
UPDATE tradelens.product SET is_deleted = 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0
